concept.title: Upgrade to an annual billing cycle

note.p: Only monthly subscriptions can be upgraded to annual ones.

conbody.p: To upgrade to an annual billing cycle, follow these steps:

ol.li: Log in to Katalon TestOps and select the desired Account.

li.p: In the Additional Subscription section, locate the license you want to upgrade, then click option > Upgrade.
In the checkout page, switch the billing cycle from monthly to annual. Apply discount code, if any.
Fill in or update your billing information, then click Checkout.

conbody.p: Successful payment will immediately change your subscription.
